scripts.dev:reset: npm run dev:clean && npm run prepare
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run dev:reset && npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.dev:validate: npm run build:all && npm run lint:check && npm run format:check && npm run type-check && npm run test:ci
scripts.format: prettier --write --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern src/commerce-backend-ui-1/test src/commerce-backend-ui-1/actions src/commerce-backend-ui-1/scripts src/commerce-backend-ui-1/lib src/commerce-backend-ui-1/web-src src/commerce-backend-ui-1/e2e hooks .eslintrc.json *.md docs/*.md
scripts.format:check: prettier --check --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern src/commerce-backend-ui-1/test src/commerce-backend-ui-1/actions src/commerce-backend-ui-1/scripts src/commerce-backend-ui-1/lib src/commerce-backend-ui-1/web-src src/commerce-backend-ui-1/e2e hooks .eslintrc.json *.md docs/*.md
scripts.lint: eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern src/commerce-backend-ui-1/test src/commerce-backend-ui-1/actions src/commerce-backend-ui-1/scripts src/commerce-backend-ui-1/lib src/commerce-backend-ui-1/web-src src/commerce-backend-ui-1/e2e hooks
scripts.lint:check: eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --max-warnings 0 src/commerce-backend-ui-1/test src/commerce-backend-ui-1/actions src/commerce-backend-ui-1/scripts src/commerce-backend-ui-1/lib src/commerce-backend-ui-1/web-src src/commerce-backend-ui-1/e2e hooks
